オプション1: Star Man told his companions what had happened that day.
"There’s a dangerous man in this area."
"He attacked me with a knife the moment we met."
"Why not meet him again and try talking it out?"
Triangle Man said.
"No... he didn’t seem like the type you could talk to."
Trapezoid Man grimaced.
"Was he really skinny?"
"No... if anything, he was kind of chubby."
"Then it was Noble. He was ridiculously fat, right?"
(I don’t remember him being that big. Maybe he lost weight?)

"Stay away from Ness and Noble.
They’re basically the reason my legs are like this."
"What happened...?"
"A lot of things..."

"So they’re at Gip Lighthouse now?
They used to be at the old port—probably the VirtualBecks Port ruins.
Ness is the skinny one, Noble is the fat one."

"Then maybe there’s no one at VirtualBecks Port ruins now.
If that’s the case, we might be able to get a boat without building a raft."

"I don’t think there were any boats.
We might find materials we can use to build one, though."
"I’ll check it out sometime."
Trapezoid Man thought for a moment.
"Be careful."
"Yeah."
